tags.name: zui-button
tags.description: The technical definition of a "button" `<button>` is an element that keeps the user within the same context. This action will keep the user within the same workflow.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Use this attribute when you want to disable `<zui-button>`

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Use this attribute when you want to disable `<zui-button>`

slots.description: Unnamed slot, pass: text, `<a>`, `<button>`, and if applicable, `<zui-icon>`'s into

cssProperties.name: --zui-button-hover-color
cssProperties.description: also primary & secondary button focus color

tags.name: zui-fab
tags.description: `zui-fab`'s main use is for slotting in an icon or graphic into a `zui-button`; good example would be our floating chat assistance button, pinned to the bottom right of some of our apps.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Use this attribute when you want to disable `<zui-fab>`

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Use this attribute when you want to disable `<zui-fab>`

slots.description: Unnamed slot, pass in: an icon, `<zui-icon>` or `<svg>`

cssProperties.name: --zui-button-text-color
cssProperties.description: Default button text color, will cause `svg`s to inherit this color unless specified otherwise

cssProperties.name: --zui-button-hover-color
cssProperties.description: Hover and focus button background color

cssProperties.name: --zui-floating-action-button-icon-color
cssProperties.description: Inherits `#fff` value from `--zui-button-text-color`, can override this value or CSS prop this inherits

cssProperties.name: --zui-button-icon-size
cssProperties.description: If using `<zui-icon>` it will take this size as width and height

tags.name: zui-button-dropdown
tags.description: A component that uses a `<zui-button>` to open a dropdown menu of options.

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: This attribute will decide whether the submenu is open or not

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: This attribute will decide whether you want to disable the `<zui-button>` dropdown trigger

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Use this attribute to set the type of button dropdown you want. You can combine `primary`, `secondary`, `link`, and `danger` with `icon`. See [Buttons](https://zui.zywave.com/components/buttons/) for button style variations.
attributes.type: primary | secondary | link | danger | icon | primary  icon | secondary icon | link icon | danger icon

properties.name: open
properties.description: This attribute will decide whether the submenu is open or not

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: This attribute will decide whether you want to disable the `<zui-button>` dropdown trigger

properties.name: type
properties.description: Use this attribute to set the type of button dropdown you want. You can combine `primary`, `secondary`, `link`, and `danger` with `icon`. See [Buttons](https://zui.zywave.com/components/buttons/) for button style variations.
properties.type: primary | secondary | link | danger | icon | primary  icon | secondary icon | link icon | danger icon

slots.description: Unnamed slot, for text seen within the `<zui-button>` dropdown trigger

slots.name: option
slots.description: For each dropdown menu option, apply this slot attribute to your slotted menu item

cssParts.name: menu
cssParts.description: The menu container for the dropdown menu, this is exposed as a shadow part and can be accessed with ::part(menu)
